errors.title: Oops!
errors.description: An error occurred while executing the command /%{commandName}%! This error has been automatically forwarded for review. Sorry.

field2.name: Over Max Length
field2.value: The message of this error is over 1024 characters long and was cut short

blockedUsers.title: Blocked User
blockedUsers.description: You were blocked form using this bot. You cannot appeal this.

devMode.title: Developer Mode
devMode.description: This bot is in developer only mode, likely due to a major issue or an upgrade that is taking place. Please check back later!

owner.title: Insufficient Permissions
owner.description: You cannot execute this command without being an owner!

dm.title: DM Channel
dm.description: You cannot execute this command in the DM channel! Please switch to a server channel!

embed1.title: Cooldown
embed1.description: You are executing commands too quickly! This cooldown of this command is %{cooldown}% seconds. This message will turn green in %{timeLeft}% seconds once the cooldown expires.

embed2.title: Cooldown Over
embed2.description: The cooldown has expired! You can now execute the command /%{commandName}%!

all.title: Commands
all.description: Arguments in brackets are required. Arguments in arrows are sometimes required based on the previous argument. You can use the command /help [command] [a command] to see more about a specific command.

dm.name: Direct Messages
dm.value: This command cannot be used in the DM channel

owner.name: Bot Owner
owner.value: Being an owner is required to execute this command

modules.title: Modules
modules.description: You can add or remove modules here. See more about a module by selecting it. Then, press the button to remove or add it. If you want to delete some or all of your data used by or associated with this bot, you can request it with /deletedata.

statusField.name: Status
statusField.added: You have added this module. Click on the button to disable it. Your data will be left intact.
statusField.removed: This module is currently disabled. Click "Enable" to enable it.

embed2.title: üèì Ping!
embed2.description: Websocket heartbeat is %{wsPing}%ms. This interaction took %{rtPing}%ms from registering the slash command to displaying the initial message.
